# Invalid: unsupported HTTP method in action
version: "1.0"
profile: ARW-3

site:
  name: Test Site
  homepage: https://example.com

actions:
  - id: test_action
    name: Test Action
    endpoint: /api/test
    method: INVALID_METHOD
    auth: none

policies:
  training:
    allowed: false
  inference:
    allowed: true
  attribution:
    required: true
